So we've been getting these odds jam notifications in this form For... Actually, forever. So like-Basically, we get them as an email. Um... and So... We just parse these emails and send them as Discord notifications. Um... But they give us basically all the event information and their odds to hit rating. And so what their odds to hit rating is basically like they have their own algorithms that they run.

And they just say, basically, I think this event is going to hit at 60%. And so every time they think it's going to hit at 60%, they give it a 54.14% odds to hit rating. that data and say, oh, so when they actually give it this rating, we They actually hit at 70% or 80%, so we can just filter out the future notifications so that we only look at the ones that are hitting 80%, 85%. Gotcha. So it was taking us a while because we didn't have it was we have like about 200,000 or probably 250,000 of these individual events.
